>@Compendium[sfrpg.class-features.R9jL6JIFvO0e6Q5L]{Immortal Tutor (Su) - Protean}

You learn your patron’s third lesson, which grants an additional benefit whenever the first lesson ability is active.

Third Lesson: Your form becomes extremely fluid. You gain the @Compendium[sfrpg.universal-creature-rules.sguC9bc7vP22wrXW]{Compression (Ex)} ability (Alien Archive 153), can move through difficult terrain as though it were normal terrain, and gain a +3 circumstance bonus to KAC and saving throws against attacks of opportunity and effects that would grapple or entangle you.


Toggle on/off KAC modifer in the Modifier tab.
